explanation: Fitness is potentially inverted either by experimental design or processing
Apparantly synonymous mutations change fitness, potentially the WT sequence is incorrect.

cause: Positions fall outside the studied landscape
explanation: The study contains positions with unusual ER profiles, possibly indicating a type of position not contained in the original dataset or an unusual experimental design that doesn't necessarily mirror standard biological properties. Identify positions using landscape_outliers().
This suggests the protein region may be weakly selected or the experimental design was less selective than usual.
